title: The Braided Path
description: The Empire of Saramyr is ancient and, at its core, corrupt. The families that rule the empire have relied on the depraved Weavers and their magic for too long, and now there is a price to be paid. The Weavers will not suffer any but themselves to wield magic. All children born with any magical talent are declared Aberrant, and must die.But the Empress of Saramyr is keeping a deadly secret from the Weavers: her own daughter is Aberrant. As rumours begin to spread about the Heir-Empress, the families begin to plot a new succession and the Empire slides inexorably towards civil war.And all the while their frightening ragged advisors, the Weavers, make their own plans...
author: Chris Wooding
